name: The Wrath of Pele
description:
The Wrath of Pele is a game about serving the Fire Goddess "Pele". You must preform a ritual to activate her volcano and bring molten death to the villagers below. Experiment with the different ingredients to discover what they do. Different combinations do different things. Find the best way to wreak havoc.

Made For Global Game Jam 2016


Pro-tip: you can press '1' to turn on God-Mode.
